channel.title: Changing how fast you gain levels?
channel.description: We'll on ricscape they gain levels way to fast i want to change how fast they change levels. How do i do that?

item.title: Changing how fast you gain levels?
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

are you talking about like on the dummys and hay bales and stuff?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2007, 08:28:21 PM[/size][hr]if you are talking about the dummys then look at this:

case 823:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“O ya im RAPEN that dummy!”);
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((1000000playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((1000000playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((1000000playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((1000000playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((1000000playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((1000000playerLevel[5]), 5);
addSkillXP((1000000*playerLevel[6]), 6);
actionTimer = 3;
}
break;

where you see the ((100000* well yours might be something like that. all you got to do is to change the 100000 or what ever you got to how much xp you wont them to git.

and this ((1000000*playerLevel[1]), 1); both of thos ones mean what skill you wo
^ ^
both of thos ones mean what skill you wont the xp for.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing how fast you gain levels?
